description: The function is vulnerable to Path Traversal (CWE-22) because it uses user-supplied input in file paths without proper sanitization, allowing an attacker to access arbitrary files. It is also vulnerable to SQL Injection (CWE-89) as it uses user-supplied input in SQL queries without proper sanitization, allowing an attacker to manipulate SQL queries. Additionally, it is vulnerable to Cross-site Scripting (CWE-79) as it uses user-supplied input in HTML output without proper sanitization, allowing an attacker to inject arbitrary HTML or JavaScript.
